channel.title: Game Boy
channel.description:
Broke out some old classics on my emulator. :P
Got all the Megaman battle network games and Pokemon Gold and Sapphire.
So, then it got me thinking. Who wants to have a competion to see who can beat all the pokemon games first. That means red/blue, yellow, gold/silver, crystal, sapphire/ruby, and the last green one.

item.title: Game Boy
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:15, topic:311285”][quote author=`jeba link=topic=407728.msg3011574#msg3011574 date=1256824122]
red/blue, yellow, gold/silver, crystal, sapphire/ruby,

Crossed out = Fail games.
[/quote][quote author=Primadude link=topic=407728.msg3011575#msg3011575 date=1256824195]

red/blue, yellow, gold/silver, crystal, sapphire/ruby,

Crossed out = Fail games.

This is true, but silver was the shit.
[/quote]

WTF!!! silver was the greatest thing created[/quote]
IMO I think reds the best, i did have all 150 :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 30-10-2009, 15:38:49[/size][hr][quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:19, topic:311285”]I lost my Game Boy Advanced :([/quote]
Ha! I still have my Gameboy Color

Read full topic

item.title: Game Boy
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I am being serious…

[ul][li]First of all get Mupen64++ (coz thats the online emu I use)[/li]
[li]Aquire Goldeneye N64 ROM- THE NTSC VERSION!(Ini code: 41F2B98F-B458B466-C45)[/li]
[li]Set up emu using: http://www.goldeneyeonline.com/[/li]
[li]Go onto Kaillera net play option[/li]
[li]Go on Master Servers List[/li]
[li]Connect to Lufia Server (7.207.45.30:27888) Servers in France, hopefully Americans have low ping[/li][/ul]

Now we just need to set a time.
If you want a game with me now- go on irc and we can arrange.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Boy
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Fat Cookies:

I think we should have epic online multiplayer battle on Goldeneye 007 on N64. We all play 4 player games against eachother and the person with most wins becomes the winrar and recieves many cookies.

Goldeneye was fucking beastly.
